name: DevOps Munich
summary: Content Pack for DevOps Munich Feb 7, 2019

source.@value:
pipeline "Apache Logs"
stage 0 match either
rule "geoip-lookup"
end

template.@value:
# Needed for Graylog
fields_under_root: true
fields.collector_node_id: ${sidecar.nodeName}
fields.gl2_source_collector: ${sidecar.nodeId}

metricbeat.modules:
- module: system
  metricsets:
    - cpu
    - load
    - memory
    - uptime
  enabled: true
  period: 10s
  processes: ['.*']
- module: docker
  metricsets:
    - "container"
    - "info"
  hosts: ["unix:///var/run/docker.sock"]
  period: 10s
  enabled: true

output.logstash:
   hosts: ["10.22.33.100:5044"]
path:
  data: /var/lib/graylog-sidecar/collectors/metricbeat/data
  logs: /var/lib/graylog-sidecar/collectors/metricbeat/log

description.@value: GeoIP lookup of client IP address

template.@value:
# Needed for Graylog
fields_under_root: true
fields.collector_node_id: ${sidecar.nodeName}
fields.gl2_source_collector: ${sidecar.nodeId}

filebeat.inputs:
- input_type: log
  paths:
    - /var/log/access_log
  type: log
output.logstash:
   hosts: ["10.22.33.100:5044"]
path:
  data: /var/lib/graylog-sidecar/collectors/filebeat/data
  logs: /var/lib/graylog-sidecar/collectors/filebeat/log
